verses.kjv: And the whole congregation of the children of Israel assembled together at Shiloh, and set up the tabernacle of the congregation there. And the land was subdued before them.
verses.ct: The entire community of Israel gathered at Shiloh and set up the tent of meeting there. The land had been brought under their control.

verses.kjv: And there remained among the children of Israel seven tribes, which had not yet received their inheritance.
verses.ct: But there were still 7 tribes among the Israelites that had not yet received their allotted territory.

verses.kjv: And Joshua said unto the children of Israel, How long are ye slack to go to possess the land, which the LORD God of your fathers hath given you?
verses.ct: Joshua said to the Israelites, "How long are you going to put off going in and taking possession of the land that the LORD, the God of your ancestors, has given you?

verses.kjv: Give out from among you three men for each tribe: and I will send them, and they shall rise, and go through the land, and describe it according to the inheritance of them; and they shall come again to me.
verses.ct: Choose 3 men from each tribe, and I will send them out. They will go throughout the land and map it out according to each tribe's share, and then report back to me.

verses.kjv: And they shall divide it into seven parts: Judah shall abide in their coast on the south, and the house of Joseph shall abide in their coasts on the north.
verses.ct: They are to divide it into 7 portions. Judah will stay in their territory to the south, and the house of Joseph will stay in their territory to the north.

verses.kjv: Ye shall therefore describe the land into seven parts, and bring the description hither to me, that I may cast lots for you here before the LORD our God.
verses.ct: Once you have mapped out the land in 7 sections, bring the written description here to me, and I will cast lots for you here in the presence of the LORD our God.

verses.kjv: But the Levites have no part among you; for the priesthood of the LORD is their inheritance: and Gad, and Reuben, and half the tribe of Manasseh, have received their inheritance beyond Jordan on the east, which Moses the servant of the LORD gave them.
verses.ct: The Levites, however, do not get a portion among you, because serving as priests of the LORD is their inheritance. And Gad, Reuben, and the half-tribe of Manasseh have already received their inheritance on the east side of the Jordan, which Moses, the servant of the LORD, gave them."

verses.kjv: And the men arose, and went away: and Joshua charged them that went to describe the land, saying, Go and walk through the land, and describe it, and come again to me, that I may here cast lots for you before the LORD in Shiloh.
verses.ct: So the men got up and set out. Joshua instructed those going to survey the land, saying, "Go travel through the land, write up a description of it, and come back to me so I can cast lots for you in the presence of the LORD here at Shiloh."

verses.kjv: And the men went and passed through the land, and described it by cities into seven parts in a book, and came again to Joshua to the host at Shiloh.
verses.ct: The men traveled through the entire land and recorded a description of it in a document, dividing it by towns into 7 sections. Then they returned to Joshua at the camp in Shiloh.

verses.kjv: And Joshua cast lots for them in Shiloh before the LORD: and there Joshua divided the land unto the children of Israel according to their divisions.
verses.ct: Joshua cast lots for them at Shiloh in the presence of the LORD, and there he distributed the land to the Israelites according to their tribal divisions.

verses.kjv: And the lot of the tribe of the children of Benjamin came up according to their families: and the coast of their lot came forth between the children of Judah and the children of Joseph.
verses.ct: The lot for the tribe of Benjamin came up first, clan by clan. Their allotted territory fell between the descendants of Judah and the descendants of Joseph.

verses.kjv: And their border on the north side was from Jordan; and the border went up to the side of Jericho on the north side, and went up through the mountains westward; and the goings out thereof were at the wilderness of Bethaven.
verses.ct: On the north side, their boundary started at the Jordan, went up along the north side of Jericho, then climbed westward through the hill country, ending at the wilderness of Beth-aven.

verses.kjv: And the border went over from thence toward Luz, to the side of Luz, which is Bethel, southward; and the border descended to Atarothadar, near the hill that lieth on the south side of the nether Bethhoron.
verses.ct: From there the boundary crossed over toward Luz (that is, Bethel) on its south side, then went down to Ataroth-addar near the hill south of Lower Beth-horon.

verses.kjv: And the border was drawn thence, and compassed the corner of the sea southward, from the hill that lieth before Bethhoron southward; and the goings out thereof were at Kirjathbaal, which is Kirjathjearim, a city of the children of Judah: this was the west quarter.
verses.ct: The boundary then turned and curved along the western side southward, starting from the hill facing Beth-horon on the south, and ended at Kiriath-baal (that is, Kiriath-jearim), a town belonging to the descendants of Judah. This was the western side.

verses.kjv: And the south quarter was from the end of Kirjathjearim, and the border went out on the west, and went out to the well of waters of Nephtoah:
verses.ct: The southern side began at the edge of Kiriath-jearim, and the boundary ran westward to the spring at the waters of Nephtoah.

verses.kjv: And the border came down to the end of the mountain that lieth before the valley of the son of Hinnom, and which is in the valley of the giants on the north, and descended to the valley of Hinnom, to the side of Jebusi on the south, and descended to Enrogel,
verses.ct: Then the boundary went down to the base of the mountain overlooking the Valley of Ben-hinnom, which is at the north end of the Valley of Rephaim. It continued down through the Valley of Hinnom along the south side of the Jebusite city, and then down to En-rogel.

verses.kjv: And was drawn from the north, and went forth to Enshemesh, and went forth toward Geliloth, which is over against the going up of Adummim, and descended to the stone of Bohan the son of Reuben,
verses.ct: It curved northward to En-shemesh, continued to Geliloth (which faces the ascent of Adummim), and went down to the Stone of Bohan son of Reuben.

verses.kjv: And passed along toward the side over against Arabah northward, and went down unto Arabah:
verses.ct: It then passed along the north side of the slope facing the Arabah and went down into the Arabah.

verses.kjv: And the border passed along to the side of Bethhoglah northward: and the outgoings of the border were at the north bay of the salt sea at the south end of Jordan: this was the south coast.
verses.ct: The boundary continued along the north side of Beth-hoglah and ended at the northern bay of the Dead Sea, at the southern end of the Jordan. This was the southern boundary.

verses.kjv: And Jordan was the border of it on the east side. This was the inheritance of the children of Benjamin, by the coasts thereof round about, according to their families.
verses.ct: The Jordan River formed the eastern boundary. These were the borders surrounding the inheritance of the descendants of Benjamin, clan by clan.

verses.kjv: Now the cities of the tribe of the children of Benjamin according to their families were Jericho, and Bethhoglah, and the valley of Keziz,
verses.ct: The towns belonging to the tribe of Benjamin, clan by clan, were: Jericho, Beth-hoglah, Emek-keziz,

verses.kjv: And Betharabah, and Zemaraim, and Bethel,
verses.ct: Beth-arabah, Zemaraim, Bethel,

verses.kjv: And Avim, and Parah, and Ophrah,
verses.ct: Avvim, Parah, Ophrah,

verses.kjv: And Chepharhaammonai, and Ophni, and Gaba; twelve cities with their villages:
verses.ct: Chephar-ammoni, Ophni, and Geba — 12 towns along with their surrounding villages.

verses.kjv: Gibeon, and Ramah, and Beeroth,
verses.ct: Also Gibeon, Ramah, Beeroth,

verses.kjv: And Mizpeh, and Chephirah, and Mozah,
verses.ct: Mizpeh, Chephirah, Mozah,

verses.kjv: And Rekem, and Irpeel, and Taralah,
verses.ct: Rekem, Irpeel, Taralah,

verses.kjv: And Zelah, Eleph, and Jebusi, which is Jerusalem, Gibeath, and Kirjath; fourteen cities with their villages. This is the inheritance of the children of Benjamin according to their families.
verses.ct: Zelah, Eleph, Jebusi (that is, Jerusalem), Gibeah, and Kiriath — 14 towns along with their surrounding villages. This was the inheritance of the descendants of Benjamin, clan by clan.
